website_summaries.verdict: An attractive twist on the classic Birkenstock sandal with similar foot construction and a look that will appeal to anyone who likes the thong sandal style.
pros: Differs from traditional Birkenstocks by adding a thong style
A feminine look that women praise for pairing nicely with skirts, shorts, and other summer outfits
cons: Some consumers who have owned Gizehs before gripe that the toe separator is stiffer than that of previous pairs, requiring a break-in period

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Birks
customer_reviews.text: I'm so in love with Birkenstock but have never been able to swing paying almost $200 for a pair. Well this is the best deal ever. I've purchases off brand Birks but the piece between the toes is normally made of fabric which wears out fast. This perfect pair has a plastic piece in between the toes. Probably the best purchase I've ever made. NOT ON SIZING: After reading some reviews on sizing I went against the recommended size. I wear an 8 or 8 /12 (9 in boots) so I ordered a 38M and they fit perfectly. Keep in mind Birks will mould to your foot so if it's too big it'll just flap around.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wallace

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: love my jesus slippers! I got the Toffee which has a little shine. the seller ships fast.
customer_reviews.author: kbbjedi

customer_reviews.title: A modern twist with a bit of shimmer
customer_reviews.text: I got my Birkenstock Arizona platform sandals today & they are gorgeous. As many have noted, they run large so order down a size. The narrow size is deceiving because they are not narrow at all so unless you have a wide foot don’t give it a second thought. I had to tighten the straps to the first hole for extra support & Im hoping they don’t stretch. Wear them around the house for an hour & they will begin to mould to the shape of your foot.
customer_reviews.author: J Lapidus

customer_reviews.title: I Need More!
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with purchase. A colleague wore a silver pair and I fell in love! This Toffee color will be versatile for any outfit. I already have the copper and silver on my list. The size 38 is perfect for my feet. I have wide feet and these for comfortably. I haven't owned a pair of Birkenstocks since college and I've fallen in love with them all over again.
customer_reviews.author: FoodieFemale

customer_reviews.title: I love love love these birks but they run very big
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these birks but they run very big. I wound up w a 38 - I usually wear a 39-40. I also have a rather wide foot. Now that I have the right size I'm thrilled!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: The sandal is just beautiful and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled to know that I can purchase these new styled Birkenstock Papillio in the US and on-line in the US with Amazon. The delivery service was amazing. I am looking forward to sporting my new sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Shoes arrived scratched and damaged
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great, however, shipping took two weeks and when they came, the shoe box was shipped in a large paper envelope. The shoe box was torn and bent... completely destroyed. The shoes themselves had multiple deep scratches in the metallic finish of the leather. I ended up keeping them because I wanted to wear them to an event and the style is so cute and comfy, but I wish I had sent them back because the scratches are so noticeable. At this price point they should at least look new!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Runs large - order one size down
customer_reviews.text: These run large....I wear a size 7 (38) normally but I wear a size 6 (37) in this style. Love the small chunky platform.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLE

customer_reviews.title: Wife gifting in front of Inlaws--Ugh!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife as a Christmas gift after I noticed her repeatedly lamenting that her old ones had given up the ghost. They seemed expensive for sandals, but then I found out that she had her last pair for 15 years! And she wore them constantly. Every day. Long story short, she loved the new pair, and I had a gift-giving win in front of the in-laws. What-what!?! Who's your Daddy? I'm your Daddy! No joke--she wears these things virtually every day. They look great. And, apparently, they feel like walking on sunshine. Couldn't be happier. Thanks Birkenstock--you peeps rock!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goodman

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE NOT BIRKENSTOCKS
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE NOT BIRKENSTOCKS. They are labeled "papillio" all over (branded on the shoes themselves, in the tissue paper, on the box - "papillio," no sign of birkenstock. I didn't pay over $100 on sandals for papillio. I paid for birks. SO ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: They’re good, but they aren’t Birckenstocks
customer_reviews.text: The only problem was these are marketed as Birkenstock’s when they are in fact not Birkenstocks. They are “Papillios” which is fine except these are falsely advertised, which shouldn’t be the case. They are comfortable however and cute, but they aren’t name Birckentocks.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gift these to my mother who was complaining about back and hip pain for a while. Once she started with the foot pain I know what I had to do. These shoes to the rescue. My mother says these shoes relieve the aches and are supper comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle Style

customer_reviews.title: Sizing & Pricing is ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe BUT stupidly expensive. Also, why can’t they just put U.S. sizes, it’s so hard to figure out the conversion. First pair were too big, had to return (with NO hassle - thankfully). I love Amazon’s hassle-free returns!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Supportive Cutie
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are everything. They have me standing tall and walking with a high stride. The support is amazing the arch is much needed the style makes them universal. Don’t hesitate buy
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle Style

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstocks with bling!
customer_reviews.text: Birkenstocks with some flare! Love the Papillio birdies! Same comfort with some bling!
customer_reviews.author: suedogs

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are great, package appearance were not
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, not great packaging. Came in a box that was really beat up, neither sandal straps were buckled. It was messy & since I was giving them as a gift I was less than impressed with the overall appearance. Luckily the shoes looked ok after I buckled them and I tried to get the box back to shape best I could. The shoes itself are good though & fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TiffMurray

customer_reviews.title: Arrived With Broken Buckle
customer_reviews.text: I love Birkenstock sandals, and I wear them almost exclusively. However, these sandals arrived with a broken buckle, and are unwearable. Unfortunately, because they looked OK, I didn't inspect them thoroughly until I was about to wear them, 6 months after purchase. I'm especially irritated, as this is the second pair of shoes that I've ordered through Amazon that were clearly unwearable. Please be careful and check all purchases to see if they had previously been returned for defects and then resold to unsuspecting buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Jane A. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Chunky is an under statement. Not the arch support I was expecting. Very sturdy and softer inside then the other Birkenstock’s
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle Style

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I wore my first pair to death ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I wore my first pair to death (as in almost every day for probably 75% of the year) & they lasted 5 years. I have another pair now & I'm going to see if sealing the cork will extend their life a bit. Also got some for my aunt who loves them too. FYI, I'm a nine in most sandals but 39s fit me better than 40s in these.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwisam

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting them to say Birkenstock they are also hard when you put them on unlike my other Birkenstock’s. Super shiny
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a pair of Birkenstock's for awhile now, and am so glad I finally purchased a pair! I was extremely pleased with the Amazon price on these, AND I signed up to receive the Amazon Shoe emails and received 20% off, for a grand total of $49. Everywhere else they are $89 and up. I love the color of the sandal. If you have wide feet, this may not be the right sandal for you. Be sure to wear them around your house for awhile, to break in the soles. Be prepared for your feet to hurt for a bit, but I have heard once you break them in, you can wear them everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Scratched Upon Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was authentic Papillio/Birkenstock, but just like many others here, they arrived scratched. They seem to have been handled poorly and just thrown in a box with no care at all. That made it 2 star for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lavar

customer_reviews.title: Very hard shoe
customer_reviews.text: I liked the height of the shoe . It was very hard and uncomfortable !
customer_reviews.author: Dr. G

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable sandals I've ever had, want them in every color. Suffered with plantar fasciitis for a long time and these supported my arch so much, never any pain while wearing them. I normally wear a size 9 shoe and the 39 fit with even a little extra wiggle room, If ur inbetween sizes I would recommend going with the smaller of the two sizes.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Love! Perfect summer sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a big fan of Birkenstock’s! I love these because they are so different, really pretty! These are my third pair. I also have 2 pair of the originals in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these sandals!!!!! I have a high arch and these support my feet wonderfully! Has taken a bit to break them in but I love them more all the time. Look dressy or casual, depending on what I'm wearing them with.
customer_reviews.author: Nmtime

customer_reviews.title: Amazing my go to shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Love so much I bought my sister some for her birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: At least a full size too big. I wear ...
customer_reviews.text: At least a full size too big. I wear an 8.5 in all shoes, so I bought a 39, which stated it was the equivalent of an 8-8.5. As you can see in the photos, they're WAY too big, so I spent over $80 for sandals I can't wear and can't return. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kara C.

customer_reviews.title: Not Birkenstock’s
customer_reviews.text: Complete knock off shoes and they still charge Birk prices. As soon as I received I realized they were knock offs and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: jaime handley

customer_reviews.title: Super cute shoes, but hurts between toes.
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love the feel of these, but I don't. I have 2 pair and love the look, but the area between my big and 2nd toes really aches. I have never had issues in this area with shoes before. Hoping that they get better with wear, but I have worn both pair several times. No one seems to know what I am talking about, so it just must be me.
customer_reviews.author: N8vTXN

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Loves these Birkenstocks. They are so comfortable. I did not find the sizing any different than my normal size so despite other reviews I ordered the same size as I usually do.
customer_reviews.author: JABC

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and seller!
customer_reviews.text: These are a beautiful color and s great fit! They arrived BEFORE the expected date! I’m thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. They are so comfortable. I had lisfranc surgery in February. I needed/wanted a sandle with good support. These are it. They feel amazing and even with high arches and post surgery I can wear them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I think these are some of the most comfortable sandals. I love the color. I wear between a 9 1/2 and 10 women's shoe size. I ordered a 39 after trying on buying a different style in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Not for shoe sizes that does not include 1/2 size
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended, If you are not 1/2 size more in shoe size. Do not take a shoe size to include the 1/2 size. Size down will be too small
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Great for plantar fascitis
customer_reviews.text: First Birkenstock’s, don’t believe in paying $100 for sandals but Pediatrist recommended for plantar fasciitis- worked really well! Comfy, but clunky
customer_reviews.author: Dani Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Leaves green spot of foot.
customer_reviews.text: The front tap extends over my big toe and looks a little odd and the metal piece leaves a green spot on my foot if I wear them for a while. But then fit fine and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hayes

customer_reviews.title: My favorite show
customer_reviews.text: Love these! It definitely took a week or two to break them in, but they are so comfortable, and stylish! I considered returning them at first because they didn't seem comfortable when I first put them on, but once they broke in, they are my favorite summer shoe!
customer_reviews.author: lovinglogs

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are platforms and look great. I got the silver ones. They are comfortable and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable! I actually first went to a store to figure out what size to order, I'm normally a 7.5/8 with wide feet. The size I ordered was 38, i think it translates to a 7? plus, I have short toes. The outside of my feet spill over a little, but again, I have wide feet. I'm bringing this to Disneyland this week, I hope my feet won't be mad afterward!
customer_reviews.author: kako_mochi

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. I normally wear a US women's 9 and bought these in a 39. I thought at first they might be too small but after wearing a couple times my feet fit perfect. They are incredibly comfortable and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Recommend Seller
customer_reviews.text: This was a good transaction, and the Birkenstock sandals were exactly as described and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but not an all day shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking shoe. But, it is not the traditional Birk sandal. The sole bed is hard and the shoe doesn't give the comfort of a traditional Birk. I can only wear for part of the day. But, I did buy for the look. For an all day outing I wear my other Birks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen D. Eberhart Liljenberg

customer_reviews.title: Very large in size
customer_reviews.text: Bought these since I’m an 8 in shoes. These are way to big for my feet. Had to pay $12 to return them. Package came from DHL and I’m returning to Miami.
customer_reviews.author: Desireé Moore

customer_reviews.title: but it was easy for her to return
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter-in-law. Too big. She lives 250 miles away, but it was easy for her to return. Thank You. Carol Payne
customer_reviews.author: Carol Payne

customer_reviews.title: I love them but the left one is making my foot ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them but the left one is making my foot hurt on the bottom left. I’m wondering if you have to break them in. I wasn’t expecting them to be so hard but I love the style so I’m going to tough it out.
customer_reviews.author: Agapegurl

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: After reading a ton of reviews on many different sites for the best shoes for plantar fasciitis, I purchase my Birkenstock sandals here. They provide very good arch support and they fell better every time I wear them. Very please with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Poll

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these but I'm an 8.5 and ordered a 39.....WAY TOO BIG.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah May

customer_reviews.title: Questionable authenticity or the shoe is made for Amazon only
customer_reviews.text: The bottom is slippery not the same as my real Burks I am questioning the authenticity of this shoe I am returning they are stiff the leather does not seem real. I am ordering from Burks direct
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: KNOCK OFF!
customer_reviews.text: Fake as fake can be!! Do not spend your money on a fake pair!
customer_reviews.author: Lilmas

customer_reviews.title: but now they're extremely comfortable. I wear a 7-1/2 to 8
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of weeks to break in, but now they're extremely comfortable. I wear a 7-1/2 to 8. The 38 fits perfectly. Great alternative to flip flops during Florida fall. Will probably order a black pair as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. At first I thought they were too 'old lady-ish' for me....but after wearing them around, and getting used to the style, they are just perfect. I really love the way they look, they fit like a glove, and all the grooves on the bottom fit my foot perfectly as well. Great shoe and great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: DesignerDiva72

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. However it’s misleading when the description says made in Germany but it’s actually made in Portugal. True to side.
customer_reviews.author: Richie263

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit to get used to the piece between the toe. Didn't think I was goingbtoblijevthem, but stuck with them for a few days and now they are broken in, fitted to my foot and are my favorite, most comfortable pair of sandals. I'll be getting another pair next summer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but stiff center post
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but center post is VERY stiff and hurts. wore them for a few hours and developed a major blister. I only wish I had wore them within the return period, so now I'm stuck. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Let me be clear, the top part of these sandals is not leather. I wasn't aware of this (apparently I don't know my Birks) when I ordered them and was a little apprehensive about wearing/keeping them. But they have worked out wonderfully for me! They are extremely comfortable (especially as you wear them and break them in). I wear them with pants, skirts and dresses. In fact, I am tempted to get another pair - in silver/titanium. I usually wear an 8.5 or 9 and ordered these in a 39 and they fit perfectly! I got the Toffee color which is really like a metallic bronze - beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: OMG! These are great!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I normally don't write reviews but had to for these. I slipped these on and it was pure comfort. I definitely think these will be my primary summer shoes. I think I may be hooked on these. I will road test them and if I still feel the same way, more colors wil be put into my shoe collection.
customer_reviews.author: Nickie S

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & cute!
customer_reviews.text: Birks that also provide a bit of height? Um, yes please!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing seems off
customer_reviews.text: I think I am going to love them after the "break in" period, but I ordered what the size chart said I should for a size 7 foot and they were way too big. I returned them for a size smaller and they fit nicely. They are hard, like I read they would be, but I have worn them for a few hours/day around the house to break them in. I think they are really cute and I would recommend them, but sizing has proven to be tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Hostetler

customer_reviews.title: happy baby boomer
customer_reviews.text: Too bad these are now discontinued, a great sandal for wide feet. Comfortable. Wear well. I'd buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: babyboomer

customer_reviews.title: Terribly made!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes a little over 2 months ago and they are falling apart!!! The straps are ripping away from the sole!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just the sandal I needed and wanted for my daughter. It was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly Neumeyer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Birkenstock
customer_reviews.text: I love my Birkenstock shoes! No regrets! These are so comfortable and do not hurt in between my toes due to the strap that goes across. I normally wear an 8.5 and always buy a 39 (European). Had these in the past and still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control-missed sizing issues in manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: The left and right straps were not the same size The buckles were also not the same size on each shoe. Quick return for me
customer_reviews.author: kerry ciesielski

customer_reviews.title: Don't seem as comfortable as previous birkies that I had
customer_reviews.text: the sandal has more than 1/4 inch beyond the toe. Don't seem as comfortable as previous birkies that I had.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille G

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great! Love them
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great! Love them. I'm a size 8 (39) and it was way too big. Order a size down. There is a difference between regular fit and narrow fit. Regular fit was to wide I prefer narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Zita Machain

customer_reviews.title: because disappointed by hard plastic connector that goes between toes
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 3 stars, rather than 5, because disappointed by hard plastic connector that goes between toes. I expected connector would be leather and much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love them...recently I just went through back surgery and purchased them....all I can say is these sandals are great. I usually wear a size 7, I purchased the 37 and they fit perfect. Before you purchase the sandals try on a pair at a store and see how they fit.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: ... was a little more cushion but these will be good for many years
customer_reviews.text: I wear a lot wish there was a little more cushion but these will be good for many years.
customer_reviews.author: RoginskiR

customer_reviews.title: Super retro cute❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!️!!️ This is my third pair of Berkie platforms these are so retro looking and super comfy
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette M. Mallene

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: These arrived all scratched and chipped .... terrible sent them back and would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gail m.

customer_reviews.title: Size too large
customer_reviews.text: These were a 39 Euro size, but were very large.
customer_reviews.author: CRF

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but odd sizing
customer_reviews.text: The sizing seemed a little off. The shoes were very cute, but returned them due to sizing issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't used to wearing sandals with something between my toes, so it took a couple weeks to completely get used to that - but once I did, I LOVE THESE. In fact, I have them on right now!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F

customer_reviews.title: If you're a Birkie, you'll love these!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long time Birkie, so I'm not surprised that I am happy with these sandals! Very comfortable. White sole is different--nice change.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca & Ely

customer_reviews.title: Runs true to size
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible comfortable and cute! I typically wear a 40 in regular Birks and need a 40 in these too.
customer_reviews.author: ssejw

customer_reviews.title: Shirlee
customer_reviews.text: I love the flip flop style and the comfort. I normally wear a size 9 in sandals and ordered the 39 which was perfect! The toffee color has a little sheen which is very pretty on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Comfy after broken in
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be broken in first for sure. Comfy after that. Wouldn't wear for long hikes or all day walks.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable sandals I have bought in a long long time. I was worried about them being a thong, but they were fine. Did not take long to break in, and I have wide feet. The 39 REGULAR fit fine. I ended up buying 2 more pairs. They have been great for my plantefacitius.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: AHHHH 😊
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the narrow reluctantly but they fit perfectly. Love my new "Platform" Birkenstocks. I have Plantar Facitis and Birkenstocks are THE thing to get my feet feeling better. My feet are so happy to have these. 💚
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the size of the anchor in the toe area - too big
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Live
customer_reviews.text: Love my Birkis! These are amazing! The fact that they are on a platform is s bonus for keeping my feet clean!
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Birks and these did not disappoint! I love the platform.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Followed their size chart and bought the wrong size. ...
customer_reviews.text: Followed their size chart and bought the wrong size. Did not have this problem when I bought my previous sandal from another site.
customer_reviews.author: camalice

customer_reviews.title: but i hate howbig they are
customer_reviews.text: Your description of the size is not very accurate. I shouldhave ordered the next size smaller. But as it is such a pain to return, i tried to get used to them, but i hate howbig they are. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: really bad knockoff brand.
customer_reviews.text: These are not Birkenstocks. The shoe bed is very hard and discomfort .
customer_reviews.author: Becky Liang

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing . They feel better than being barefoot. I have bad knee issues and they take the pressure off my knees. No break in period needed. Amazon offers great prices compared to other retailers.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Mowad

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes can replace my $500 orthotics in the summer ... great arch support for flat feet
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Blusters but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes gave me blisters on my toes where strap hits and also on top of foot where other strap hits. Otherwise they are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Dyer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: These were my first pair, so I was nervous about how they would fit. The fit guide is extremely helpful in ensuring you find the appropriate size. I normally wear a size 9 women and ordered a 39M. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DeeMetz

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 6 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 6 weeks ago so I am outside of the return window. The cork footbed on one shoe is already cracking and broken. Complete crap! My last pair lasted 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: House of Boys

customer_reviews.title: cannot get enough of these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: this is the seventh (!!!) pair of gizehs i've purchased this year. i now own them in black, brown, pink, silver, blue, green, and lavendar -- obviously, i adore them. totally comfortable and stylish, and i think they're flattering to my feet, which are on the wider end of normal.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! They fit perfectly and are extremely comfortable, don't hesitate buying them because they will be gone if you wait much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Denice SJ

customer_reviews.title: Great brand!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first of Birkenstock's and I love it. The material and fit is great. I will definitely enjoy wearing theses in the summertime. The color is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Casou01

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to get used to
customer_reviews.text: The arch support is very supportive! Takes a bit of time to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Minnis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow cut. Beware if you don't have a narrow fit typically
customer_reviews.author: kristina abdalla

customer_reviews.title: very comfy
customer_reviews.text: i never wear them but it is my wife's second pair and she wears them both a lot! (different colors)
customer_reviews.author: wood working tool engineer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are so so cute in silver! I did purchase the black color last summer. I love the comfort of these sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit and are comfortable but they were shipped in a bag with no original box.
customer_reviews.author: MGoodWil

customer_reviews.title: Great support.
customer_reviews.text: You either like this shoe and how it fits, or you don't. However it is worth getting used to. Good support. Great for those with fallen arches.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Boyce

product_meta.title: BIRKENSTOCK Women's Papillio Arizona Platform Sandals
product_meta.description:
FEATURES of the Birkenstock Women's Gizeh Sandal Cork and latex footbed designed to mirror the shape of a healthy foot and provide a natural walking environment More toe room allowing toes to move naturally, which promotes better balance and correct foot alignment from toe to heel Raised toe bar encourages natural gripping motion of your feet, exercises the legs and stimulates circulation Contoured footbed ensures even weight distribution and proper posture Deep heel cup cradles the heel and keeps natural cushioning right under the calcaneous (also known as the heel bone) Shock absorbing sole is flexible, durable, lightweight, repairable and replaceable, like almost every part of our shoes Jute fibers made of two layers - one wicks away moisture, the other adds strength Cork footbed is firm and resilient for maximum support Footbed Liner made of soft suede keeps your feet comfortable and dry

This is the real deal. Cork, leather, a buckle or two: these are the simple ideas that have made feet happy for over two hundred years, and that's the original Birkenstock. These shoes are made in Germany since 1774. No smoke, no mirrors, and no gizmos are needed. You walk, the shoe molds to your foot. The shape of the Original Birkenstock Footbed enables body weight to be distributed evenly over the whole foot, providing it with optimal support.
feature_bullets: The classic Arizona is taken to stylish new heights with the addition of lightweight EVA platform midsole.
